Package com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.keyvault.secrets.properties

Class AzureKeyVaultPropertySourceProperties

java.lang.Object
com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.properties.core.AbstractAzureServiceConfigurationProperties
com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.properties.core.AbstractAzureHttpConfigurationProperties
com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.keyvault.secrets.properties.AzureKeyVaultPropertySourceProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
AzureProperties, TokenCredentialOptionsProvider, AzureProfileOptionsProvider, ClientOptionsProvider, ProxyOptionsProvider, RetryOptionsProvider
public class AzureKeyVaultPropertySourceProperties extends AbstractAzureHttpConfigurationProperties
Configurations to set when Azure Key Vault is used as an external property source.
Since:
4.0.0
